definition: Tongliao prefecture level city in Inner Mongolia
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
short name for Liaoning 遼寧|辽宁[Liao2 ning2] province/Liao or Khitan dynasty (907-1125)

sentences.english: There are five main water systems and large areas of wetland in Tongliao city.
sentences.chinese: 通遼市主要有五大水系，溼地面積廣闊。
